# Print

The function prints the arguments

For example:
```{r}
print('hello world')
print('12138')
print(1 + 1)
```

---

# Sum

The function sum all the arguments

For example:
```{r}
sum(1, 2)
sum(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)
```
